key.name: auto-save-session
key.description: If enabled, gnome-session will save the session automatically.

key.name: auto-save-session-one-shot
key.description: When enabled, gnome-session will automatically save the next session at log out even if auto saving is disabled.

key.name: logout-prompt
key.description: If enabled, gnome-session will prompt the user before ending a session.

key.name: show-fallback-warning
key.description: If enabled, gnome-session will display a warning dialog after login if the session was automatically fallen back.
